BdE ggplot2 theme

Source: R/theme_bde.R
theme_bde.Rd

A custom ggplot2 theme based on the publications of BdE.

theme_bde(...)

Arguments

...

Ignored.

Value

A ggplot2::theme().

See also

ggplot2::theme()

Other bde_plot: bde_pals, scales_bde

Examples

# \donttest{
library(tidyverse)

#> -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.1 --
#> v ggplot2 3.3.5     v purrr   0.3.4
#> v tibble  3.1.5     v dplyr   1.0.7
#> v tidyr   1.1.4     v stringr 1.4.0
#> v readr   2.0.2     v forcats 0.5.1
#> -- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() --
#> x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
#> x dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()

series_TC <- bde_series_full_load("TC_1_1.csv")

# If download was OK then plot
if (nrow(series_TC) > 0) {
  series_TC <- series_TC[c(1, 2)]

  series_TC_pivot <- series_TC %>%
    filter(
      Date >= "2020-01-01" & Date <= "2020-12-31",
      !is.na(series_TC[[2]])
    )

  names(series_TC_pivot) <- c("x", "y")

  ggplot(series_TC_pivot, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
    geom_line(size = 0.8, color = bde_vivid_pal()(1)) +
    labs(
      title = "Title",
      subtitle = "Some metric",
      caption = "Bank of Spain"
    ) +
    theme_bde()
}

# }

About tidyBdE

Developed by Diego H. Herrero, part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public Spanish open sources.
